name: Drills & Gadgets
description:
Factory Inc. is back at it again with another… troublesome challenge. Guide a drill to a massive diamond lying deep under the Earth’s surface, while dodging giant worms and collection resources and upgrades to help you along your journey.

Made in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 48 Compo. All art and sound was made during the jam.

Ludum Dare link: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/48/$250074
